      • test

        public boolean test​(int type,
                    long sourceReference,
                    long targetReference)
        Description copied from class: RelationshipSelection
        Tests whether a relationship of a certain type between certain nodes should be part of this selection.
        Overrides:
        test in class RelationshipSelection
        Parameters:
        type - the relationship type id of the relationship to test.
        sourceReference - reference to start node.
        targetReference - reference to end node.
        Returns:
        whether or not this relationship type is part of this selection.

        public int numberOfCriteria()

      • isTypeLimited

        public boolean isTypeLimited()
        Specified by:
        isTypeLimited in class RelationshipSelection
        Returns:
        true if this selection is limited on type, i.e. if number of criteria matches number of selected types, otherwise false.

      • addedRelationship

        public org.eclipse.collections.api.iterator.LongIterator addedRelationship​(NodeState transactionState)
        Description copied from class: RelationshipSelection

        Specified by:
        addedRelationship in class RelationshipSelection
        Parameters:
        transactionState - the NodeState to select added relationships from.
        Returns:
